name: Battle Training: US Army Games
description:
We welcome you to the army commando training school where we will be transforming cadets into soldiers at US army war commando academy. You have joined academy normally known as a military boot camp. To be a daring soldier, you have to clear all training courses in martial training academy. Battle Training: US Army Games provides different army shooting training exercises to be strong combat soldier. In US army commando war training academy, basic shooting is the first step of training as a military soldier. Follow all the commands & directions from your team leader. Practice to be a trained shooter to complete all levels. Improve your time management skill by completing levels within the time limits. Play again and again to finish the commando survival mission within the minimum time.

Army commando are specially trained for survival missions where the soldiers are against you. The real pride is never easy to get, so be ready for the real hard time combat against the guerrilla squad. Your job as the army commando is to eliminate resistance, rescue hostages, get the hold of weaponry and stop the illegal shipment. Whoever gets in your duty, is a hurdle and real army commando knows how to overcome hurdles. This is the real army survival mission so be prepared for a survival war.

So what are you waiting for? Download the game and enjoy the army combat training experience of real warfare!
